headlines.description: Brentford striker Ivan Toney's first half penalty secured a 1-0 win over ailing Everton on Sunday, heaping more misery on the visitors.
headlines.shortLinkText: Toney pen sees Brentford past dismal Everton

headlines.description: — James Maddison inspired Leicester to a 4-2 win over Watford in the Premier League to ruin Claudio Ranieri’s return on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Maddison ruins Ranieri's return as Leicester beats Watford

events.name: West Ham United at Manchester City

headlines.description: Snow may have slowed down the match at the Etihad but it didn't stop Manchester City from securing a 2-1 win over West Ham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City conquer snow to keep title pressure on

headlines.description: A second half penalty saved Chelsea's blushes and they drew 1-1 with Manchester United in Michael Carrick's final game in charge.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jorginho penalty rescues draw vs. Man Utd
